20110105190004.000|20110105190008.000|CC1|IT IN AMERICAN, STENY.          
20110105190008.000|20110105190009.000|CC1|AND SO DEMOCRATS WILL JUDGE WHAT
20110105190009.000|20110105190010.000|CC1|COMES BEFORE CONGRESS FROM      
20110105190010.000|20110105190012.000|CC1|EITHER SIDE OF THE AISLE AS TO  
20110105190012.000|20110105190015.000|CC1|WHETHER IT CREATES JOBS,        
20110105190015.000|20110105190017.000|CC1|STRENGTHENS THE MIDDLE CLASS AND
20110105190017.000|20110105190020.000|CC1|REDUCES THE DEFICIT, NOT        
20110105190020.000|20110105190024.000|CC1|BURDENING FUTURE GENERATIONS.   
20110105190024.000|20110105190026.000|CC1|WHEN THE NEW SPEAKER OF THE     
20110105190026.000|20110105190028.000|CC1|HOUSE, JOHN BOEHNER, AND THE NEW
20110105190028.000|20110105190030.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN MAJORITY -- AND

20110105190032.000|20110105190034.000|CC1|FORWARD WITH SOLUTIONS THAT WILL
20110105190034.000|20110105190035.000|CC1|ADDRESS THESE AMERICAN          
20110105190035.000|20110105190036.000|CC1|CHALLENGES, YOU WILL FIND US A  
20110105190036.000|20110105190043.000|CC1|WILLING PARTNER.                
20110105190043.000|20110105190045.000|CC1|AS WE CONGRATULATE SPEAKER      
20110105190045.000|20110105190047.000|CC1|BOEHNER AND OUR REPUBLICAN      
20110105190047.000|20110105190050.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES, AS WE WISH THEM     
20110105190050.000|20110105190052.000|CC1|SUCCESS, WE MUST STAND READY TO 
20110105190052.000|20110105190054.000|CC1|FIND COMMON GROUND, TO SOLVE

20110105190100.000|20110105190103.000|CC1|AND AS WE TAKE THE OATH OF      
20110105190103.000|20110105190105.000|CC1|OFFICE TODAY TO SUPPORT AND     
20110105190105.000|20110105190106.000|CC1|DEFEND THE CONSTITUTION, WE MUST
20110105190106.000|20110105190111.000|CC1|BE EVER MINDFUL THAT IT MAKES US
20110105190111.000|20110105190112.000|CC1|TRUSTEES TO THE AMERICAN PEOPLE

20110105190113.000|20110105190117.000|CC1|RIGHT FOR THEM AND CUSTODIANS OF

20110105190126.000|20110105190133.000|CC1|I THANK YOU.

20110105190134.000|20110105190136.000|CC1|ALL OF THE NEW MEMBERS OF

20110105190138.000|20110105190140.000|CC1|BEEN REELECTED, BUT ESPECIALLY  
20110105190140.000|20110105190142.000|CC1|THE NEW MAJORITY AND THE NEW    
20110105190142.000|20110105190142.000|CC1|SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE, JOHN      
20110105190142.000|20110105190147.000|CC1|BOEHNER.                        
20110105190147.000|20110105190149.000|CC1|NOW THE HOUSE WILL BE LED BY A  
20110105190149.000|20110105190153.000|CC1|PROUD SON OF OHIO, A MAN OF     
20110105190153.000|20110105190155.000|CC1|CONVICTION, A PUBLIC SERVANT OF

20110105190222.000|20110105190225.000|CC1|GOD, FAITH IN OUR COUNTRY, AND

20110105190610.000|20110105190612.000|CC1|I ALSO WANT TO ACKNOWLEDGE SOME

20110105190630.000|20110105190631.000|CC1|THANK YOU FOR BEING HERE,       
20110105190631.000|20110105190639.000|CC1|GENTLEMEN, I APPRECIATE IT.     
20110105190639.000|20110105190644.000|CC1|I'M HONORED AND HUMBLED TO      
20110105190644.000|20110105190645.000|CC1|REPRESENT A GREAT, HARD-WORKING 
20110105190645.000|20110105190647.000|CC1|COMMUNITY AND CONGRESS.         
20110105190647.000|20110105190650.000|CC1|THE PEOPLES OF OHIO'S EIGHTH    
20110105190650.000|20110105190652.000|CC1|CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICT CONTINUE 
20110105190652.000|20110105190655.000|CC1|TO AFFORD ME THE PRIVILEGE TO   
20110105190655.000|20110105190656.000|CC1|SERVE, FOR WHICH I AM DEEPLY    
20110105190656.000|20110105190657.000|CC1|GRATEFUL.                       
20110105190657.000|20110105190659.000|CC1|WE GATHER HERE TODAY AT A TIME  
20110105190659.000|20110105190702.000|CC1|OF GREAT CHALLENGES.            
20110105190702.000|20110105190705.000|CC1|NEARLY 1 IN 10 OF OUR NEIGHBORS 
20110105190705.000|20110105190708.000|CC1|ARE STILL OUT OF WORK.          
20110105190708.000|20110105190709.000|CC1|RISING HEALTH CARE FOR OUR      
20110105190709.000|20110105190712.000|CC1|FAMILIES, OUR SPENDING HAS      
20110105190712.000|20110105190713.000|CC1|CAUGHT UP WITH US AND OUR DEBT  
20110105190713.000|20110105190717.000|CC1|SOON WILL ECLIPSE THE ENTIRE    
20110105190717.000|20110105190719.000|CC1|SIZE OF OUR NATIONAL ECONOMY.   
20110105190719.000|20110105190720.000|CC1|HARD WORK AND TOUGH DECISION    
20110105190720.000|20110105190723.000|CC1|WILL BE REQUIRED OF THE 112th   
20110105190723.000|20110105190723.000|CC1|CONGRESS.                       
20110105190723.000|20110105190725.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE FALL SHORT.    
20110105190725.000|20110105190729.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE KICK THE CAN   
20110105190729.000|20110105190730.000|CC1|DOWN THE ROAD.                  
20110105190730.000|20110105190732.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE HAVE VOTED TO END    
20110105190732.000|20110105190733.000|CC1|BUSINESS AS USUAL AND TODAY WE  
20110105190733.000|20110105190734.000|CC1|BEGIN TO CARRY OUT THEIR        
20110105190734.000|20110105190737.000|CC1|INSTRUCTIONS.                   
20110105190737.000|20110105190755.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110105190755.000|20110105190757.000|CC1|IN THE CATHOLIC FAITH, WE ENTER 
20110105190757.000|20110105190800.000|CC1|INTO A SEASON OF SERVICE BY     
20110105190800.000|20110105190802.000|CC1|HAVING ASHES MARKED ON OUR HEAD.
20110105190802.000|20110105190805.000|CC1|THE ASHES REMIND US THAT LIFE IN
20110105190805.000|20110105190808.000|CC1|ALL OF ITS FORMS IS VERY        
20110105190808.000|20110105190808.000|CC1|FRAGILE.                        
20110105190808.000|20110105190809.000|CC1|OUR TIME ON THIS EARTH,         
20110105190809.000|20110105190811.000|CC1|FLEETING.                       
20110105190811.000|20110105190814.000|CC1|BUT AS THE ASHES ARE DELIVERED, 
20110105190814.000|20110105190817.000|CC1|WE HERE THOSE HUMBLING WORDS -- 
20110105190817.000|20110105190819.000|CC1|REMEMBER, YOU ARE DUST AND TO   
20110105190819.000|20110105190821.000|CC1|DUST YOU SHALL RETURN.          
20110105190821.000|20110105190823.000|CC1|THE AMERICAN PEOPLE HAVE HUMBLED
20110105190823.000|20110105190824.000|CC1|US.                             
20110105190824.000|20110105190825.000|CC1|THEY HAVE REFRESHED OUR MEMORIES
20110105190825.000|20110105190828.000|CC1|TO JUST HOW TEMPORARY THE       
20110105190828.000|20110105190830.000|CC1|PRIVILEGE OF SERVING IS.        
20110105190830.000|20110105190832.000|CC1|THEY HAVE REMINDED US THAT      
20110105190832.000|20110105190836.000|CC1|EVERYTHING HERE IS ON LOAN FROM 
20110105190836.000|20110105190836.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20110105190836.000|20110105190839.000|CC1|THAT INCLUDES THIS GAVEL, WHICH 
20110105190839.000|20110105190841.000|CC1|I ACCEPT CHEERFULLY AND         
20110105190841.000|20110105190843.000|CC1|GRATEFULLY, KNOWING THAT I AM   
20110105190843.000|20110105190844.000|CC1|BUT ITS CARETAKER.              
20110105190844.000|20110105190845.000|CC1|AFTER ALL, THIS IS THE PEOPLE'S 
20110105190845.000|20110105190859.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105190859.000|20110105190901.000|CC1|THIS IS THEIR CONGRESS.         
20110105190901.000|20110105190901.000|CC1|IT'S NOT -- IT'S ABOUT THEM, NOT
20110105190901.000|20110105190905.000|CC1|ABOUT US.                       
20110105190905.000|20110105190907.000|CC1|WHAT THEY WANT IS A GOVERNMENT  
20110105190907.000|20110105190908.000|CC1|THAT'S HONEST, ACCOUNTABLE AND  
20110105190908.000|20110105190910.000|CC1|RESPONSIVE TO THEIR NEEDS, A    
20110105190910.000|20110105190912.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT THAT RESPECTS        
20110105190912.000|20110105190915.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL LIBERTY, HONORS OUR  
20110105190915.000|20110105190916.000|CC1|HERITAGE AND BOWS BEFORE THE    
20110105190916.000|20110105190919.000|CC1|PUBLIC THAT IT SERVES.          
20110105190919.000|20110105190920.000|CC1|LET'S START WITH THE RULES      
20110105190920.000|20110105190921.000|CC1|PACKAGE THAT THE HOUSE WILL     
20110105190921.000|20110105190922.000|CC1|CONSIDER TODAY.                 
20110105190922.000|20110105190925.000|CC1|IF PASSED, IT WILL CHANGE HOW   
20110105190925.000|20110105190927.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION OPERATES.      
20110105190927.000|20110105190930.000|CC1|WITH AN EMPHASIS ON REAL        
20110105190930.000|20110105190931.000|CC1|TRANSPARENCY, GREATER           
20110105190931.000|20110105190933.000|CC1|ACCOUNTABILITY AND A RENEWED    
20110105190933.000|20110105190935.000|CC1|FOCUS ON OUR CONSTITUTION.      
20110105190935.000|20110105190937.000|CC1|OUR AIM WILL BE TO GIVE THE     
20110105190937.000|20110105190941.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BACK TO THE AMERICAN 
20110105190941.000|20110105190942.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105190942.000|20110105190942.000|CC1|IN SEEKING THIS GOAL, WE WILL   
20110105190942.000|20110105190944.000|CC1|PART WITH SOME OF THE RITUALS   
20110105190944.000|20110105190947.000|CC1|THAT HAVE COME TO CHARACTERIZE  
20110105190947.000|20110105190948.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION UNDER          
20110105190948.000|20110105190949.000|CC1|MAJORITIES, BOTH REPUBLICAN AND 
20110105190949.000|20110105190952.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT ALIKE.                 
20110105190952.000|20110105190954.000|CC1|WE WILL DISPENSE WITH THE       
20110105190954.000|20110105190955.000|CC1|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM THAT BIGGER 
20110105190955.000|20110105190958.000|CC1|BILLS ARE ALWAYS BETTER, THAT   
20110105190958.000|20110105191001.000|CC1|FAST LEGISLATING IS GOOD        
20110105191001.000|20110105191002.000|CC1|LEGISLATING, ALLOWING AMENDMENTS
20110105191002.000|20110105191005.000|CC1|THAT OPENED DEBATE MAKES THE    
20110105191005.000|20110105191007.000|CC1|LEGISLATIVE PROCESS LESS        
20110105191007.000|20110105191009.000|CC1|EFFICIENT THAN OUR FOREFATHERS  
20110105191009.000|20110105191011.000|CC1|HAD INTENDED.                   
20110105191011.000|20110105191011.000|CC1|THESE MISCONCEPTIONS HAVE BEEN  
20110105191011.000|20110105191014.000|CC1|THE BASIS FOR THE RITUALS OF A  
20110105191014.000|20110105191015.000|CC1|MODERN WASHINGTON.              
20110105191015.000|20110105191017.000|CC1|THEY, IN MY OPINION, HAVE NOT   
20110105191017.000|20110105191018.000|CC1|BEEN SERVED WELL TO THE AMERICAN
20110105191018.000|20110105191021.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105191021.000|20110105191023.000|CC1|TODAY, MINDFUL OF THE LESSONS OF
20110105191023.000|20110105191028.000|CC1|THE PAST, WE OPEN A NEW CHAPTER.
20110105191028.000|20110105191029.000|CC1|LEGIS                           
20110105191029.000|20110105191031.000|CC1|LEGISLATORS WILL HAVE THREE DAYS
20110105191031.000|20110105191035.000|CC1|BEFORE IT COMES TO A VOTE.      
20110105191035.000|20110105191037.000|CC1|LEGISLATION WILL BE MORE        
20110105191037.000|20110105191038.000|CC1|CONSTITUTIONALLY SOUND.         
20110105191038.000|20110105191039.000|CC1|COMMITTEES, ONCE BLOATED, WILL  
20110105191039.000|20110105191042.000|CC1|BE SMALLER WITH A RENEWED       
20110105191042.000|20110105191045.000|CC1|MISSION, INCLUDING OVERSIGHT.   
20110105191045.000|20110105191046.000|CC1|OLD RULES THAT HAVE MADE IT EASY
20110105191046.000|20110105191047.000|CC1|TO INCREASE SPENDING WILL BE    
20110105191047.000|20110105191049.000|CC1|REPLACED BY NEW REFORMS THAT    
20110105191049.000|20110105191052.000|CC1|MAKE IT EASIER TO CUT SPENDING. 
20110105191052.000|20110105191054.000|CC1|AND WE WILL START BY CUTTING    
20110105191054.000|20110105191108.000|CC1|CONGRESS' OWN BUDGET.           
20110105191108.000|20110105191114.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]
